channel.title: GitHub on Matthew Haffner
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on Matthew Haffner

item.title: The Burnination of the Wordpress
item.description: I’m currently in the process of moving my blog to GitHub pages. I’m doing this for several reasons: (1) Ease of creating/publishing posts On my first few Wordpress posts I typed content directly in Wordpress. I didn’t mind this at the time, but eventually I started using Emacs org-mode for all writing, including research papers, blog posts, etc. After a semi-debacle of copying an html-exported org file into Wordpress, I never posted again.
